name: Nidoqueen

attacks.name: Boyfriends
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Nidoking you have in play.

flavorText: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

strengths: Boyfriends can deal up to 60 damage for just 2 energy
Synergizes with Nidoking for bonus damage
weaknesses: Boyfriends requires Nidoking in play for full power
synergies: Double Colorless Energy - Powers attacks faster
counters: Gust of Wind - Target Nidoking to reduce Boyfriends damage

competitiveHistory: Nidoqueen was rarely played competitively. While Boyfriends had interesting synergy with Nidoking, running two Stage 2 evolution lines was impractical. Most players preferred more consistent strategies.

rulings.ruling: Boyfriends counts all Nidoking you have in play, including Benched Nidoking.
If you have 2 Nidoking in play, Boyfriends does 20 + 20 + 20 = 60 damage.
Mega Punch has no additional effect.
